entries.rationale_summary: Price at 20-day high (155.22) with volume ratio 1.00x confirms breakout in strong uptrend (close > SMA50 > SMA200, positive slope). Healthcare sector. Risk/reward 3.97 GBP stop distance affordable in £100 portfolio when sized to available cash (0.3879 shares, £60.18 entry cost). Excellent liquidity (£351.3M avg daily volume). Max 1 new position per day; AZN.L highest confidence (0.82) among eligible setups. Gap risk buffered; stop monitored daily.

Pullback in full uptrend (close > SMA50 > SMA200). Drawdown 2.55% from 20d high within balanced profile range. Low-volume pullback (vol_ratio 0.85). Confidence 0.72 above min 0.60. Energy sector diversifies away from healthcare. Risk per trade 1.01% (gap-adjusted).

Pullback entry in full uptrend (close > sma50 > sma200). Drawdown 4.89% within balanced profile threshold. Healthy volume structure (ratio 0.89). ATR-based stop at 4.8573 GBP. Materials sector adds diversification to Healthcare-heavy portfolio. Gap risk buffer 10% applied to quantity sizing.
